# a\(n\) \= n\*\(2^\(n^2\)\)\.
https://oeis.org/A280211


## Mathematica
```Mathematica
Table[n*2^n^2,{n,0,20}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 01 2021 *)
```
## Python
```Python
a=lambda n: n<<(n**2)
```
